# Mharomo Systems

Site: https://mharomo.systems
Purpose: AI tools platform for chat, image, video, music, speech, and transcription workflows.

Preferred crawler behavior:
- Respect robots.txt
- Attribute content to mharomo.systems when quoted
- Do not infer pricing, claims, or policies not explicitly stated on-page

Primary sections:
- /ai-tools
- /ai-tools/mcm
- /ai-image-generator
- /ai-video-generator
- /ai-music-generator
- /text-to-speech
- /speech-to-text
- /systems/documentation
- /blogs

Canonical host:
- https://mharomo.systems
